lead_paragraph: The women who have gathered in New York this week for the fourth annual training institute of the American Women's Voluntary Services have listened to some pretty plain speaking on the requirements for civilian defense work. There is nothing dramatic or spectacular about modern war, the Mayor warned them in his opening address.
